text: The RDS-9 was part of a string of Nuclear weapon testing by the Soviet Union. It was tested on October 19, 1954. This test was the first failure in the RDS series of tests. It was developed originally for the T-5 torpedo. The weapon was modified and retested in 1955. == References == Category:Nuclear weapons testing Category:Nuclear weapons of the Soviet Union Category:1954 in the Soviet Union Category:Nuclear bombs of the Soviet Union
title: RDS-9
